otherNames: Ke Dan Xiuxian Zhi Gou Changsheng, Immortal Cultivation With Pills Paid by Cash Will Only Lead to Immortality, Kè Dān Xiūxiān Zhǐ Gǒu Chángshēng, 氪丹修仙只苟长生, Kryptonite for Immortal Cultivation Only
synopsis: Ye Sheng, who grew up under the guidance of the famous villains in the world of cultivating immortals, embarked on a journey of cultivating immortality on his own after walking out of the Valley of the Villains. Unexpectedly, he discovered that cultivating immortals seemed to be much easier than he imagined.
